Articles.Content:
Hi, I was wondering if somebody could help me. I've been using MechJeb for about 3 days and am having trouble getting into an orbit opposite of its preprogrammed orbit.

Basically, when I tell it to go to orbit from the launch pad it always goes one way. How do I go the opposite way with it?

Thank you.
Change the inclination. 0 degrees is due east, 180 degrees is west.
